page.title: 02 Communications
page.content: These days there are quite a few ways of communicating.The most obvious is the telephone.All you do is press a few buttons and you can talk to anyone you want to.But there are other ways, for using your computer for an example ,you type in one message and you can get a reply.Also on the computer you can touch the screen to speak to other people. Another way is by sending letters. You can get different types of stamps the first class stamp costs seventeen pence.That gets there quicker than any others.The second class costs thirteen pence. There are thousands of people communicating every second.But the way of communication used the most is just talking in the street. C Worsick Aged 12yrs.
